title: MicroStrategy Stock Falls 25% on Bitcoin Plunge
sub_head: The company had said it would face a margin call if the price of bitcoin drops to about $21,000
body:
Shares of MicroStrategy Inc. tumbled Monday as investors fretted over what a brutal selloff in cryptocurrencies would mean for the software companyâ€™s finances.
The stock fell $51.21, or 25%, to $152.15 and has lost more than 70% of its value this year.
